content: स्वस्तिकः [स्वस्ति शुभाय हितं क] {@--1@} A kind of mystical mark on persons or things denoting good luck. {@--2@} A lucky object. {@--3@} The meeting of four roads. {@--4@} The crossing of the arms, making a sign like the cross; स्तनविनिहितहस्तस्वस्तिकाभिर्वधूभिः <ls>Māl. 4. 10</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 43.</ls> {@--5@} A palace of a particular form. {@--6@} A particular symbol made with ground rice and shaped like a triangle. {@--7@} A kind of cake. {@--8@} A voluptuary, libertine. {@--9@} Garlic. --कः, --कं {@--1@} A mansion or temple of a particular form with a terrace in front. {@--2@} A particular mode of sitting practised by {%Yogins%}.
